org.apache.taverna.commandline.data

Class DatabaseConfigurationHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.commandline.data.DatabaseConfigurationHandler

  • public class DatabaseConfigurationHandler
extends Object
    Handles the initialisation and configuration of the data source according to the command line arguments, or a properties file. This also handles starting a network based instance of a Derby server, if requested.
    Author:
    Stuart Owen
